words.source: H559 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'said', ESV 'said', NASB 'said'
H4872 proper name; all trans. agree
H2009 interj. hinneh 'behold, look'; KJV 'behold', ESV 'behold', NASB 'behold'
H595 pron. 1cs ʾanoki 'I'; KJV 'I', ESV 'I', NASB 'I'
H3318 Qal act. part. ms of יָצָא 'to go out'; KJV 'go out', ESV 'am going out', NASB 'am going out'
H5973 prep. min + prep. ʿim 'from with' + 2fs suff.; KJV 'from thee', ESV 'from you', NASB 'from you'
H6279 conj. + Hiphil perf. 1cs of עָתַר 'to pray, entreat'; KJV 'I will intreat', ESV 'I will plead', NASB 'I will make supplication'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; all trans. agree
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H5493 conj. + Qal perf. 3ms of סוּר 'to turn aside, depart'; KJV 'may depart', ESV 'may remove', NASB 'may remove'
H6157 art. + n.ms ʿarov 'swarm (of flies)'; KJV 'the swarms of flies', ESV 'the swarms of flies', NASB 'the swarms of insects'
H6547 prep. min + proper name; KJV 'from Pharaoh', ESV 'from Pharaoh', NASB 'from Pharaoh'
H5650 prep. min + n.mp construct ʿeved 'servant' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'from his servants', ESV 'from his servants', NASB 'from his servants'
H5971 conj. + prep. min + n.ms construct ʿam 'people' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'and from his people', ESV 'and from his people', NASB 'and from his people'
H4279 n.ms machar 'tomorrow'; KJV 'to morrow', ESV 'tomorrow', NASB 'tomorrow'
H7535 adv. raq 'only, surely'; KJV 'only', ESV 'only', NASB 'only'
H408 neg. particle ʾal 'not' (jussive/prohibitive); KJV 'let not', ESV 'let not', NASB 'do not let'
H3254 Hiphil juss. 3ms of יָסַף 'to add, do again'; KJV 'more', ESV 'again', NASB 'again'
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H2048 Hiphil inf. construct of הָתַל 'to mock, deceive'; KJV 'deal deceitfully', ESV 'cheat', NASB 'deal deceitfully'
H1115 prep. l- + neg. particle bilti 'not'; KJV 'not', ESV 'not', NASB 'not'
H7971 Piel inf. construct of שָׁלַח 'to send away, release'; KJV 'letting go', ESV 'let go', NASB 'letting go'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H5971 art. + n.ms ʿam 'people'; KJV 'the people', ESV 'the people', NASB 'the people'
H2076 prep. l- + Qal inf. construct of זָבַח 'to sacrifice'; KJV 'to sacrifice', ESV 'to sacrifice', NASB 'to sacrifice'
H3068 prep. l- + divine name; KJV 'unto the LORD', ESV 'to the LORD', NASB 'to the LORD'
